Title: Mizumono
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Steve Lightfoot, Bryan Fuller
Actors: Hugh Dancy, Mads Mikkelsen, Caroline Dhavernas, Laurence Fishburne
Plot: Jack devises a plan to apprehend Hannibal, while Hannibal prepares for his departure. Will makes his decision, and it results in devastating consequences.
